name: Scrambled Tofu
author: LKAUMANS
summary: This is a wonderful vegetarian dish with a great flavor. The cheese can be omitted, and other vegetables such as green peppers or mushrooms can be added. It's great served with hot bran muffins.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes with juice
1 (12 ounce) package firm silken tofu, drained and mashed
directions: Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat, and saute green onions until tender
Stir in tomatoes with juice and mashed tofu
Season with salt, pepper, and turmeric
Reduce heat, and simmer until heated through
Sprinkle with Cheddar cheese to serve
